titleStmt.title: The true relation of that vvorthy sea fight, which two of the East India shipps, had with 4. Portingals, of great force and burthen, in the Persian Gulph With the lamentable death of Captaine Andrew Shilling. With other memorable accidents, in that voiage. Printed this 2. of Iuly.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. D[awson] for Nathaniel Newbery and William Sheffard, and are to be sold in Popes-head alley,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 22433 on UMI microfilm reel 1008.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
